attributes.action: grant Margaret Thatcher a state funeral, when the time sadly arises
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Margaret Thatcher was Britain's greatest peace time Prime Minister.  She completely changed the face of this country for the better, rescuing it from socialism and every day strikes.  She gave us back our dignity, and began to make us a prosperous country once more.

rejection.details: This contains party political references which means we are unable to accept.
